name: Battleships (itch) (NigelsWB)
description:
Battleships was originally written by me in 1986!

This is the slightly updated 2022 version ;o)

It is written in pure ZX Spectrum BASIC.

Please do NOT buy this if you are expecting a high quality Arcade game lol.

It is more to show how BASIC works and a few simple programing techniques.

Downloadable .tap file to be used in a Spectrum Emulator.

Tested on a real Spectrum 48k, +2 and +2a.

Type LOAD"" to Run.

On a 128k Spectrum choose 48 BASIC, & type LOAD"" to Run. 

Also available on cassette  with a printed inlay and sleeve.
